column4: hello all. how can I check on what version am I? gutsy, Hardy or intrepid? I don't really remember which version I installed and it's all updated...
how can I install kde 4.2 on hardy? using this: "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/project-neon/ubuntu hardy main" is not enough to find kde-nightly
kde 4.1 is the latest stable release. you'll automatically get updated wen KDE 4.2 becomes stable
